metadata.description: Official Apify agent skills for web scraping, data extraction, and automation

plugins.name: apify-lead-generation
plugins.description: Generate B2B/B2C leads by scraping Google Maps, websites, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube, and Google Search using Apify Actors

plugins.name: apify-brand-reputation-monitoring
